turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you this afternoon?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to place an order a Starbucks at 55th Monument Circle, Indianapolis.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could I get a venti cafe mocha with whole milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Venti caffe mocha with whole milk it is.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your coffee has been ordered and should be ready to be picked up in 10 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you, have a wonderful rest of your day.
